portaudio::CallbackInterface

portaudio::CallbackInterface Class Reference

Interface for an object that's callable as a PortAudioCpp callback object (ie that implements the paCallbackFun method). More...

Detailed Description

Interface for an object that's callable as a PortAudioCpp callback object (ie that implements the paCallbackFun method).
